resume.name: RODOLFO SOTOLONGO

responsibilities: Develop and refine pricing models for personal lines using Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to improve loss ratio targets.
Perform quarterly reserve analysis and assist in the preparation of regulatory filings and financial reports.
Collaborate with product management to analyze the impact of rate changes on policyholder retention.
Supported senior consultants in the valuation of defined benefit pension plans by verifying participant data integrity.
Utilized SQL to extract and clean large datasets for use in predictive modeling and trend analysis.
Assisted in the automation of routine actuarial reports, increasing department efficiency by 15%.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
